member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.GetControl
member.summary: Gets the control from the collection using the specified zero-based index.
member.param: The index of the control to retrieve.
Receives a pointer to a instance representing the retrieved control.

returns.para: A HRESULT value, including the following.
| Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success. | | MF_E_INVALIDINDEX | The index was out of the allowed range.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.GetControlCount
member.summary: Gets the number of controls currently in the control defaults collection.
member.returns: A ULONG indicating the number of controls in the collection.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.GetOrAddControl
member.summary: Adds a new camera control to the camera control collection.
member.param: A value from the specifying whether the control value must be set before streaming begins or after streaming starts.
A GUID specifying the control set to which the control belongs.
The ID of the control to be added to the collection. This value must be an ID in the KSPROPERTYSETID_ExtendedCameraControl property set.
The size of the control, in bytes. This value must be greater than or equal to the size of KSPROPERTY.
The size of the data payload for the control, in bytes.
Receives a pointer to a instance representing the added control.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.GetOrAddExtendedControl
member.summary: Adds a new extended camera control to the camera control collection.
member.param: A value from the specifying whether the control value must be set before streaming begins or after streaming starts.
The ID of the control to be added to the collection. This value must be an ID in the KSPROPERTYSETID_ExtendedCameraControl property set.
The ID of the stream associated with the control. This paramater is only used for pin-level controls. Otherwise, this value is ignored.
The size of the data payload for the control, in bytes.
Receives a pointer to a instance representing the added control.

returns.para: | Value | Description | |------------|-----------| | S_OK | Success. | | MF_E_INVALIDREQUEST | The specified control ID is not in the KSPROPERTYSETID_ExtendedCameraControl property set. |

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.RemoveAllControls
member.summary: Removes all controls from the camera control collection.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection.RemoveControl
member.summary: Removes the control with the specified control set and ID from the camera control collection.
member.param: A GUID specifying the control set to which the control belongs.
The ID of the control to be removed from the collection.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaultsCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of camera controls.
